With Tom Sizemore, Damon Whitaker. Two American men rob banks in Mexico then flee back across the border to the USA. A majority of the money in these banks belongs to a ruthless Mexican drug lord, who sends one of his Lieutenants to kill the "two Americans". Instead the Lieutenant becomes their "Mexican Connection" and feeds them the scores for a cut, and plots to take over the Cartel." />        <meta property="og:description" content="Directed by Daniel Zirilli.
